name: Square City Builder (itch)
description:
A tiny city builder game pixel based.

Build, destroy, manage resources, services, city value and more.

FEATURES

  • More than 6 levels;
  • Several buildings including houses, commerce, industry, healthcare, police, power, and more;
  • 3 soundtracks;
  • 4 Map Themes;
  • Several problems to manager, as pollution, crime and power provided.

Leave feedback about gameplay, there is a free demo.
